examples.korean: Now she was dredging up memories from the depths of her mind. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이제 그녀는 마음속 깊은 곳의 기억들을 떠올리고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Whenever I find myself in trouble, I think about the time we were together at the end of last year and smile. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 곤경에 처할 때마다, 작년 말에 우리가 함께 했던 시간을 떠올리고 웃음짓곤 한다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Whenever I find myself in trouble, I think about the time we were together at the end of last year and smile. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The next time you eat a steak or drive by a farm, you should try to honor the cowboys by thinking about everything they have done for the world. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 다음번에 당신이 스테이크를 먹거나 농장 옆을 차로 지날 때, 당신은 카우보이들이 해 온 모든 일들을 생각하며 그들을 떠올리고 존중해야 합니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: The next time you eat a steak or drive by a farm, you should try to honor the cowboys by thinking about everything they have done for the world. Add to Wordbook
